about_the_game:
Add-on for Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes, containing 2x Paint for Headquarters.
Please double-check all descriptions before purchasing.

This pack includes the following:
1x Paint for Headquarters (Golden Exterior)
1x Paint for Headquarters (Pink Exterior)

*Please be aware that this set is included in the Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes - Digital Deluxe Edition and Season Pass.
*Please be careful not to purchase multiple times accidentally.
